title: Michael Eric Dyson Interview and More
itunes:title: Michael Eric Dyson Interview and More
description:
Thursday 6/7 - Today on the show, instead of having our segment "Get it Off Your Chest" we had Diddy call in and he spoke to us about the new season of the four and more. Also, we had author Michael Eric Dyson stop by where he spoke about his new book "What The Truth Sounds Like", Drake in "Black Face" and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that was purposely trying to spread HIV to other people and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 6/7 - Today on the show, instead of having our segment "Get it Off Your Chest" we had Diddy call in and he spoke to us about the new season of the four and more. Also, we had author Michael Eric Dyson stop by where he spoke about his new book "What The Truth Sounds Like", Drake in "Black Face" and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that was purposely trying to spread HIV to other people and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
